title: Leadville 100 Record-Holder Annika Langvad Is Coming Out of Retirement — To Race Gravel
content:
Langvad, who had her first child in August, will race a mixed gravel and cross-country calendar in 2025, joining Sofia Gomez Villafañe, Matt Beers, and Howard Grotts on the Specialized Off-Road team.

Read the full article at Leadville 100 Record-Holder Annika Langvad Is Coming Out of Retirement — To Race Gravel on Velo.
author: Betsy Welch
